title: Manhandled
description: Twinks, hardbodies and studs galore! This 11 BOOK Excite Spice MEGA Bundle brings you all the hot, steamy gay action you could possibly desire. This bundle is so stuffed full of hot, throbbing male-on-male action, you get over 110,000 words of men doing things to other men that will blow your mind.  Eleven of the genre’s hottest authors give you a jam-packed boxed set full of sexy gay men who have all the tools they need, and they’re not afraid to use them! This sizzling collection of gay-themed books is loaded with all the heat you want and all the delicious man-meat you’re hungry for.  So bend over, because it’s time to get manhandled! FEATURING Selena Kitt ~ Second Chance habu ~ Strapped Tight Alara Branwen ~ Alpha and Omega Celia Jordan ~ Mile High Connor Riley ~ Riding Hard on the Range Jacklyn Black ~ The Alpha's Choice Marisa Reiss ~ Shane 1: Off to College Nathan J Morissey ~ Stepbrother Love Olive Hiscock ~ Riding the Line Backer Rod Mandelli ~ Joe White & The Seven Dudes Kenn Dahll ~ Blood Oath
author: Selena Kitt
